name: Satou Shouji (aka Inazuma) Style LoRA
description:
Satou Shouji (aka Inazuma) Style LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

Asked by Hiruken on Discord. This author doesn't have a very consistent artstyle by choice, as they also likes to imitate original styles when doing doujins or fanarts. This however lead to some "substyles" inside this LoRA. Trigger is satou shouji but changes a lot when using highschool of the dead and character names such as miyamoto rei and busujima saeko. As you can see in the examples, I used very similar prompts changing only those names and it produced a different style.


How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1 which is usually too high)
